channel.title: Recipe on Something We Ate
channel.description: Recent content in Recipe on Something We Ate

item.title: Homemade Gyro
item.description: Source: tastemade.com INGREDIENTS Gryo 1 pound ground beef 1 pound ground lamb 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 teaspoon cumin Salt & pepper 1⁄2 cup breadcrumbs, soaked in olive oil 1 medium onion, grated 2 cloves garlic, grated Olive oil Tzatziki 1 English cucumber, peeled, grated and drained of excess water 3 sprigs dill Squeeze of lemon 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 1⁄2 cups Greek yogurt To serve: Pita or flatbread Shredded lettuce Red onion, thinly sliced 1 tomato, cut into chunks DIRECTIONS Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.

item.title: Street Vendor Pork Satay
item.description: Source: Jet Tila: 101 Asian Dishes You Need To Cook Before You Die INGREDIENTS 1 Tbsp curry powder 1⁄2 Tbsp pepper 1 Tbsp salt 1 Tbsp sugar 1 tsp garlic powder 1⁄4 C coconut milk 2 lbs pork shoulder or loin DIRECTIONS Combine all spices and coconut milk. Slice the pork against the grain into 2” square tiles about 1⁄4” thick. Add marinade and gently massage to cover the meat.

item.title: The Best Grilled Chicken Marinade
item.description: Grilled Chicken recipes are always a crowd-pleaser. This easy grilled chicken marinade recipe will become a favorite! Source: addapinch.com INGREDIENTS ½ cup olive oil 1 teaspoon sea salt ½ teaspoon ground black pepper ½ teaspoon paprika ½ teaspoon cumin ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper 2 cloves garlic, chopped 3 tablespoons chopped onion ½ cup chopped fresh parsley 1½ cups beer (1 12oz bottle) DIRECTIONS Pour olive oil into a 2-cup liquid measuring cup.
